9.7.9TheoremLet $V$ beaninterpretationwhichisgoodrelativeto $\Theta$ and $\beta\in$ $\mathcal{B}_{\Theta}\cap(\Theta+1)$ Then $(\mathcal{B}_{\beta})^{V}=\mathcal{B}_{\beta^{V}}^{V}$ 
Proof From $\alpha\in{\mathcal{B}}_{\beta}$ we obtain $\alpha^{V}\in\mathcal{B}_{\beta^{V}}^{V}$ byg(9.41). Hence $({\mathcal{B}}_{\beta})^{V}:=$ $\{\alpha^{V}|\alpha\in{\mathcal{B}}_{\beta}\}\subseteq{\mathcal{B}}_{\beta^{V}}^{V}$ .Converselyweobtain for $\alpha\in\mathcal{B}_{\beta^{V}}^{V}$ a $\gamma\in\mathcal{B}_{\beta}$ such that $\alpha=\gamma^{V}\in(\mathcal{B}_{\beta})^{V}$ by Llema9.7.8 Hencel $\mathcal{B}_{\beta^{V}}^{V}\subseteq(\mathcal{B}_{\beta})^{V}$ 口
